thread.title: George Clooney reveals how Cindy Crawford ended up in his bed
thread.title_full: George Clooney reveals how Cindy Crawford ended up in his bed

title: George Clooney reveals how Cindy Crawford ended up in his bed
text:
George Clooney reveals how Cindy Crawford ended up in his bed 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Friday 2nd October, 2015 
George Clooney has spilled the beans on how his best friend's wife Cindy Crawford ended up in the bed with him and it seems like tequila was the situation maker. 
At the launch of his tequila venture with Rande Gerber, the 54-year-old actor said that he and the model had a couple of drinks, when she got high and was unable to go home she decided to sleep over, reports News.com.au. 
Laughing at the situation, the 'Ocean's Eleven' star added the 49-year-old model thought Clooney was her husband Gerber, and hopped in his bed. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News MJs     Olivia
